    @allure.story("卷宗管理")
    @allure.title("刷新和关闭卷宗管理")
    def test_03_refresh_and_close(self):
        """测试刷新和关闭功能"""
        try:
            logger.info("开始执行刷新和关闭操作")
            with allure.step("点击刷新按钮"):
                refresh_button = self.wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable(
                    (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='tree-button-group ant-btn-group']//button[1]")
                ))
                refresh_button.click()
                time.sleep(1)
    
            with allure.step("点击展开按钮"):
                expand_button = self.wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable(
                    (By.XPATH, "//span[contains(@class, 'anticon-plus-square')]")
                ))
                expand_button.click()
                time.sleep(1)
    
            with allure.step("关闭卷宗管理"):
                close_button = self.wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable(
                    (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='ant-modal-footer']//button[2]")
                ))
                close_button.click()
                time.sleep(2)
    
            logger.info("刷新和关闭操作完成")
            allure.attach(
                self.driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="refresh_and_close_success",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
    
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"刷新和关闭操作失败: {str(e)}")
            allure.attach(
>               self.driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="refresh_and_close_failed",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
